Dissident opinions are labeled as hatred,
racism, facism, nazism, islamophobic, homophobic etc, which successfully puts an end to all debates in the media. This is threatening the democratic system and the freedom of speech.

This collection of ebooks won't give you a complete picture of the modern western society and its PC sickness, but will aid you in connecting the dots and hopefully make you develop your critical thinking. Everything's not always what it seem in the news
(sometimes quite the contrary), and critical thinking is essential to be able to make your own decisions about your future and the future of your country.

The first eBook collection focused mostly on intelligence and genetics. In this torrent I've included some books which covers the roots from marxism to PC, how PC is harming the modern society and how media is changing our way of thinking by changing the language and by applying it's own PC-terminology and values.
